    Publications

    1. Lim, Byungju, and Mai Vu. “Distributed Graph-Based Learning for User Association and Beamforming Design in Multi-RIS Multi-Cell Networks.” IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, vol. 24, no. 7, pp. 6118–6134, July 2025.
    2. Chapagain, Laxmi, and Shuai Nie. “Design and Characterization of Dual-Band Complementary Split-Ring Resonator Array in the D-Band for 6G Wireless Networks.” In MILCOM 2024 – IEEE Military Communications Conference (MILCOM), pp. 276–281. IEEE, 2024.
    3. Chapagain, L., and S. Nie. “Machine-Learning-Assisted Multi-Band Antenna Design in the D-Band,” 2025 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas & Propagation and North American Radio Science Meeting, Ottawa, Canada, July 2025, to appear.
    4. Co-PI Nie gave an invited talk titled “Global spectrum allocation above 200 GHz for future communication and sensing opportunities,” in the NextG Channel Model Alliance Group Meeting, December 2024 (online).
    5. Co-PI Nie gave an invited talk titled “Bridging the Digital Divide in 6G: Millimeter Wave and Terahertz Communications for Next-Generation Wireless Networks,” at the 6th Buffalo Wireless Day, Buffalo, NY, October 2024.
